Dialogue.Page: Mod: Heliostudy Authors: coderCleric, John Corby, 2walker2, Lezzlebit

Heliostudy is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod has you explore a star system said to be an educational project and festival entry of a clan of Nomai.
This mod quickly gained high critical acclaim the moment it released, really proving itself to be a very strong entry. Some people even say it's base game quality, or even better than it.
Perhaps this mod will find itself on the leaderboard?
